abstract: New York City police say Captain Scott J Forster has been put on administrative duty for failing to stay beyond his shift to help after two officers were shot and injured in Bedford-Stuyvesant neighborhood of Brooklyn.

headline.print_headline: Captain Is Put on Modified Duty for Not Helping After a Shootout
headline.main: New York Police Captain Is Put on Modified Duty for Not Helping After Shootout

snippet: A supervisor requested that Capt. Scott J. Forster, 31, stay past his shift to help coordinate the response to a gunfight that wounded two officers.
lead_paragraph: A supervisor requested that Capt. Scott J. Forster, 31, stay past his shift to help coordinate the response to a gunfight that wounded two officers.
